statements: DELETE FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 123 AND feedback_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM employee_feedback WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe' AND feedback_text LIKE '%improve%' AND feedback_date < '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM performance_reviews WHERE reviewer_id = 201 AND review_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101 AND hire_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_reviews WHERE reviewer_id = 201 AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date < '2022-01-01' AND reviewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-06-01' AND reviewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
